author.name: 大轮明王鸠摩智
author.desc: 能跟小僧打成平手的没几人

title: 鸠摩智角色经历
content: <h3 class="title-text"><span class="title-prefix">鸠摩智</span>出场背景</h3></div><div class="para" label-module="para">鸠摩智天资聪敏，过目不忘，痴迷于武学，自得<a target=_blank href="/view/33210.htm">吐蕃</a>国密教</div><div class="para" label-module="para"><a class="lemma-album layout-right nslog:10000206" title="97版天龙八部的鸠摩智（李国麟饰）"  href="/pic/%E9%B8%A0%E6%91%A9%E6%99%BA/7077660/1427573/3b87e950352ac65c6515b612fdf2b21193138abb?fr=lemma&ct=cover" target="_blank"  style="width:222px;" nslog-type="10000206"><div class="album-wrap" style="width:220px;height:169px;"><img class="picture" alt="97版天龙八部的鸠摩智（李国麟饰）" src="https://imgsa.baidu.com/baike/s%3D220/sign=e4a245bd0efa513d55aa6bdc0d6d554c/3b87e950352ac65c6515b612fdf2b21193138abb.jpg" style="width:220px;height:169px;"/></div><div class="description">97版天龙八部的鸠摩智（李国麟饰）<span class="number">(2张)</span></div><div class="albumBg"><div class="albumBgFir" style="width:214px;"></div><div class="albumBgSec" style="width:208px;"></div></div></a>宁玛派上师授以“<a target=_blank href="/view/1123181.htm">火焰刀</a>”神功后，在吐蕃扫荡黑教，威震西陲，功力见识均已臻于极高境界，具大智慧，精通佛法，每隔五年，开坛讲经说法。</div><div class="para" label-module="para">后来又与姑苏慕容氏传人<a target=_blank href="/view/709354.htm">慕容博</a>结为朋友，用“火焰刀”的修练法诀交换，得以学习<a target=_blank href="/view/46581.htm">少林派</a>绝学。<sup>[2]</sup><a class="sup-anchor" name="ref_[2]_389442">&nbsp;</a><a name="ref_2"></a><a name="ref_2"></a><a name="ref_2"></a><a name="ref_2"></a><a name="ref_2"></a><a name="ref_2"></a><a name="ref_2"></a><a name="ref_2"></a></div><div class="anchor-list"><a name="2_2" class="lemma-anchor para-title" ></a><a name="sub389442_2_2" class="lemma-anchor " ></a><a name="斗法大理" class="lemma-anchor " ></a></div><div class="para-title level-3" label-module="para-title"><h3 class="title-text"><span class="title-prefix">鸠摩智</span>斗法大理</h3></div><div class="para" label-module="para">鸠摩智身为<a target=_blank href="/view/33210.htm">吐蕃</a>护国法王，一心为国效力，毅然只身前往<a target=_blank href="/view/90725.htm">大理国</a>，企图抢夺大理不传之秘《六脉神剑经》，并展示“<a target=_blank href="/view/303363.htm">无相劫指</a>”、“<a target=_blank href="/view/333781.htm">拈花指</a>”和“<a target=_blank href="/view/1780868.htm">多罗叶指</a>”震摄众僧，以一己之力使“<a target=_blank href="/view/1123181.htm">火焰刀</a>”挑战<a target=_blank href="/view/103245.htm">天龙寺</a>众僧（<a target=_blank href="/view/848958.htm">枯荣</a>、本因、本观、<a target=_blank href="/view/3302252.htm">本相</a>、本参、本尘）合力使出的“<a target=_blank href="/view/3041.htm">六脉神剑</a>”，引发一场无形刀剑之战，不果，剑谱被毁使鸠摩智与天龙寺结下仇怨，鸠摩智便擒下大理保定帝段正明为人质，皇子段誉情急出手，最终“火焰刀”不敌“六脉神剑”，但段誉却被鸠摩智擒下。</div><div class="para" label-module="para">鸠摩智于是掳走段誉，威逼利诱以套取剑谱，最后却让段誉逃脱。<sup>[2]</sup><a class="sup-anchor" name="ref_[2]_389442">&nbsp;</a><a name="ref_2"></a><a name="ref_2"></a><a name="ref_2"></a><a name="ref_2"></a><a name="ref_2"></a><a name="ref_2"></a><a name="ref_2"></a><a name="ref_2"></a></div><div class="anchor-list"><a name="2_3" class="lemma-anchor para-title" ></a><a name="sub389442_2_3" class="lemma-anchor " ></a><a name="得小无相功" class="lemma-anchor " ></a></div><div class="para-title level-3" label-module="para-title"><h3 class="title-text"><span class="title-prefix">鸠摩智</span>得小无相功</h3></div><div class="para" label-module="para">鸠摩智在太湖畔与段誉、<a target=_blank href="/view/75804.htm">阿朱</a>、<a target=_blank href="/view/701872.htm">阿碧</a>二姝失散之后，曾先潜回<a target=_blank href="/view/7777813.htm">参合庄</a>，起初见到庄中书房的藏书只是些《<a target=_blank href="/view/540502.htm">十三经注疏</a>》、《殿本廿二史》、《<a target=_blank href="/view/577989.htm">诸子集成</a>》之类书生所用的书本，全无所得，隔日才见到王夫人<a target=_blank href="/view/1816591.htm">李青萝</a>到参合庄找女儿，鸠摩智见机行事，跟踪至王家，在琅嬛玉洞中得知<a target=_blank href="/view/345119.htm">逍遥派</a><a target=_blank href="/view/724118.htm">小无相功</a>的练法。<sup>[2]</sup><a class="sup-anchor" name="ref_[2]_389442">&nbsp;</a><a name="ref_2"></a><a name="ref_2"></a><a name="ref_2"></a><a name="ref_2"></a><a name="ref_2"></a><a name="ref_2"></a><a name="ref_2"></a><a name="ref_2"></a></div><div class="anchor-list"><a name="2_4" class="lemma-anchor para-title" ></a><a name="sub389442_2_4" class="lemma-anchor " ></a><a name="修炼《易筋经》" class="lemma-anchor " ></a></div><div class="para-title level-3" label-module="para-title"><h3 class="title-text"><span class="title-prefix">鸠摩智</span>修炼《易筋经》</h3></div><div class="para" label-module="para">阿朱从少林寺菩提院偷《<a target=_blank href="/subview/31408/14677324.htm" data-lemmaid="587021">易筋经</a>》来后给了乔峰，后乔峰掉了，让游坦之捡到，游坦之在路上遇到鸠摩智，误以为鸠摩智是去少林寺的高僧，并将「易筋经」交给了鸠摩智，鸠摩智从此得到易筋经练法，至此内力大增，但因练功急于求成，反之挑战出内伤。<sup>[2]</sup><a class="sup-anchor" name="ref_[2]_389442">&nbsp;</a><a name="ref_2"></a><a name="ref_2"></a><a name="ref_2"></a><a name="ref_2"></a><a name="ref_2"></a><a name="ref_2"></a><a name="ref_2"></a><a name="ref_2"></a></div><div class="anchor-list"><a name="2_5" class="lemma-anchor para-title" ></a><a name="sub389442_2_5" class="lemma-anchor " ></a><a name="战虚竹" class="lemma-anchor " ></a></div><div class="para-title level-3" label-module="para-title"><h3 class="title-text"><span class="title-prefix">鸠摩智</span>战虚竹</h3></div><div class="para" label-module="para">其后他又出现于<a target=_blank href="/view/4314.htm">嵩山</a><a target=_blank href="/view/1761.htm">少林寺</a>，并展示“大金刚拳”中的“洛钟东应”、“般若掌”中的“慑魔外道”、“<a target=_blank href="/view/8567945.htm">摩诃指</a>”中的“三入地狱”和“<a target=_blank href="/view/3324066.htm">袈裟伏魔功</a>”震摄众僧，欲以“少林七十二绝技”威逼少林众僧臣服<a target=_blank href="/view/33210.htm">吐蕃</a>，并使“<a target=_blank href="/view/333781.htm">拈花指</a>”击倒<a target=_blank href="/view/8844021.htm">玄渡</a>，却被<a target=_blank href="/view/345119.htm">逍遥派</a>第三代掌门<a target=_blank href="/view/443647.htm">虚竹</a>揭破他所使的并非真的少林绝技，而是逍遥派的“小无相功”，之后两人约定以少林武功比武，鸠摩智先使“般若掌”，被虚竹当即以一招“韦陀掌”中的“山门护法”将他掌力化去，鸠摩智袖里乾坤“托钵掌”击向对方，虚竹闪避，鸠摩智早料到他闪避的方位，鸠摩智再出“大金刚拳”轰中虚竹肩头，哪知虚竹有“北冥真气”护体，鸠摩智先后使出“<a target=_blank href="/view/9453775.htm">如影随形腿</a>”、“多罗指法”、“<a target=_blank href="/view/2757879.htm">燃木刀法</a>”、“<a target=_blank href="/view/9453754.htm">大智无定指</a>”、“去烦恼指”、“<a target=_blank href="/view/9453759.htm">寂灭抓</a>”和“因陀罗抓”，接连使出六七门少林神功，虚竹无从招架，连“韦陀掌”也使不上了，虚竹用却只使一门“<a target=_blank href="/view/36132.htm">罗汉拳</a>”中的“黑虎偷心”，来来去去便只一招，但这招“黑虎偷心”中所含的劲力却竟不断增强，鸠摩智使出“龙爪功”拿下虚竹，却反被虚竹突施<a target=_blank href="/view/345119.htm">逍遥派</a>的“<a target=_blank href="/view/1215801.htm">天山折梅手</a>”拿住手腕，鸠摩智情急之下单手用回吐蕃武学，虚竹单手挥“天山六阳掌”化解，最后鸠摩智欲抽回双手施展“火焰刀”而不可得，只能突发<a target=_blank href="/view/114159.htm">匕首</a>，连“天山折梅手”也抓不实，而刺中虚竹，而<a target=_blank href="/view/2318177.htm">灵鹫宫</a>梅兰菊竹四剑突现身阻止。<sup>[2]</sup><a class="sup-anchor" name="ref_[2]_389442">&nbsp;</a><a name="ref_2"></a><a name="ref_2"></a><a name="ref_2"></a><a name="ref_2"></a><a name="ref_2"></a><a name="ref_2"></a><a name="ref_2"></a><a name="ref_2"></a></div><div class="anchor-list"><a name="2_6" class="lemma-anchor para-title" ></a><a name="sub389442_2_6" class="lemma-anchor " ></a><a name="误入枯井" class="lemma-anchor " ></a></div><div class="para-title level-3" label-module="para-title"><h3 class="title-text"><span class="title-prefix">鸠摩智</span>误入枯井</h3></div><div class="para" label-module="para">在西夏国王招亲期间，鸠摩智意外跌落一口枯井里，同时因走火入魔而狂性大发，一身内功刚好被<a target=_blank href="/subview/39527/8021631.htm" data-lemmaid="5314440">段誉</a>的“<a target=_blank href="/view/146278.htm">北冥神功</a>”吸走。<sup>[2]</sup><a class="sup-anchor" name="ref_[2]_389442">&nbsp;</a><a name="ref_2"></a><a name="ref_2"></a><a name="ref_2"></a><a name="ref_2"></a><a name="ref_2"></a><a name="ref_2"></a><a name="ref_2"></a><a name="ref_2"></a></div><div class="anchor-list"><a name="2_7" class="lemma-anchor para-title" ></a><a name="sub389442_2_7" class="lemma-anchor " ></a><a name="人物结局" class="lemma-anchor " ></a></div><div class="para-title level-3" label-module="para-title"><h3 class="title-text"><span class="title-prefix">鸠摩智</span>人物结局</h3></div><div class="para" label-module="para">鸠摩智武功尽失后，却因此而大彻大悟，返回吐蕃，埋首钻研佛经，成为一代高僧。<sup>[2]</sup><a class="sup-anchor" name="ref_[2]_389442">&nbsp;</a>
